create table memo(num int auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(30), content varchar(1000), avatar varchar(50), writeday datetime)

create table ajaxboard (num smallint auto_increment primary key, writer varchar(20), subject varchar(100), content varchar(1000), avata varchar(50), writeday datetime)
create table sinsang(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20), blood varchar(5), hp varchar(30), birth datetime)
create table idx(num smallint auto_increment primary key, name varchar(20), id varchar(20), pass varchar(20))
